Nathula Pass connects
Which of the following statements is correct about the Prime Minister of India?
Options: Prime Minister is the nominal head of the Council of Ministers.
He is not responsible to the Parliament.
He cannot dismiss any of his ministers.
Prime Minister is the real head of the Council of Ministers.
CorrectAnswer: Prime Minister is the real head of the Council of Ministers.

Question: The President of India is elected through the
Options: System of consensus at legislature level
System of consensus at executive level
System of proportional representation by means of the single transferable vote
System of proportional representation by means of multiple transferable vote
CorrectAnswer: System of proportional representation by means of the single transferable vote

CorrectAnswer: Protest against the imposition of salt tax

CorrectAnswer: infant mortality, life expectancy and adult literacy rate
